name: 張云馨
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
schedule:
week 1.Jamie Oliver's school dinners
week2: Let's make a fruit pavlova
week3:The highs school that beat MIT
week4:The most useful invention
week5:Choosing to study abroad
week6:My travel journal
week7:A student budget
week8:My money
week9:midterm
week10:cell phone etiquette
week11:Moblogging
week12:Choosing the olympic city
week13:Unusual olympic sports
week14,15:review
week16: final
scorePolicy: daily scores, in-class performance, attendance(40%), midterm(30%) and final((30%).
